TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateScriptTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class GenerateScriptTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class GenerateScriptTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定服务器类型必须在代理对象中生成。

span.span: Specifies that the server type must be generated in the proxy object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在启用了 AJAX 的 ASP.NET Web 站点中，ASP.NET 可以自动生成 Web 服务类的方法的代理对象。In AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web sites, ASP.NET can automatically generate proxy objects for methods of a Web service class. 做到这一点对于大多数顶级类型的输入的参数和返回任何的值 Web 方法的标记为。It does this for most top-level types for the input parameters and return values of any Web methods that are marked with . 在其他情况下，如果代理对象生成的服务器类型，则必须应用手动。In other cases, if you proxy objects generated for server types, you must apply manually. 您可以将应用到 Web 服务本身或到任何 Web 服务方法或`static`页面方法标记有。You can apply to the Web service itself or to any Web service method or `static` page method marked with . 在某些情况下，即使类型对应于输入的参数或返回值的 Web 服务方法，代理将不会自动生成。In some cases, even if the type corresponds to an input parameter or return value of a Web service method, the proxy will not be generated automatically. 在这种情况下，必须使用属性生成的类型的代理对象。In that case, you must use the attribute to generate the proxy object for the type. 对泛型类型和数组，具有多个参数，如将发生这种情况`Dictionary>`。This occurs for generic types and arrays that have more than one argument, such as `Dictionary>`. 一个或多个实例可以应用于 Web 服务类或方法。One or more instances of can be applied to a Web service class or method. ASP.NET 将再生成引用的每个声明的每个顶级类型的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代理类。ASP.NET will then generate an ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxy class for each top-level type that is referenced by each declaration of . > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要生成嵌套类型的代理对象，则必须手动应用到每个嵌套类型。If you want to generate proxy objects for nested types, you must manually apply to each nested type. ASP.NET 生成仅为顶级类型的代理，并且不会不会自动以递归方式将特性应用于嵌套的类型。ASP.NET generates proxies only for top-level types and does not automatically recursively apply the attribute to nested types. 有关如何使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用到 Web 服务类和 Web 方法。The following example shows how to apply to a Web service class and to a Web method. 因此，`ColorObject`类型和其嵌套的类型`FavoriteColors`包含的代理对象中。As a result, the `ColorObject` type and its nested type `FavoriteColors` are included in the proxy object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type
param.span: 要包括在代理类中的类型。

span.span: The type to include in the proxy class.

summary.span: 为指定类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是可选的此构造函数的命名参数。The property is an optional named parameter for this constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用生成元数据标记使用的特定类型标识符的指定类型的代理对象。The following example shows how to use to generate a proxy object for the specified type that uses a specific type identifier for the metadata marker.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ScriptTypeId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ScriptTypeId : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置类型元数据标记的类型标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the type identifier for the type metadata marker.

value.span: 序列化的 JavaScript 对象符号 (JSON) 字符串中的类型元数据标记的类型标识符。

span.span: The type identifier for the type metadata marker on the serialized JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string.

value.span: 默认值为此类型的程序集限定名称。

span.span: The default value is the assembly-qualified name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个可选属性。This is an optional property. 如果指定的值上而非程序集限定类型名称序列化的 JSON 字符串用于类型元数据标记 ("__type")。If specified, the value of is used for the type metadata marker ("__type") on the serialized JSON string instead of the assembly-qualified name of the type. 在反序列化过程的类型解析程序与该键相关联对象将使用的类型元数据标记值将映射到相应的托管类型返回。During deserialization, the type resolver that is associated with the object will use the type metadata marker value to map back to the appropriate managed type.

summary.span: 获取包含在代理对象中的类型。

span.span: Gets the type that is included in the proxy object.

value.span: 包含在所生成的代理对象中的类型对象。

span.span: The type object that is included in the generated proxy object.
